imdb.plot outline: Kate is here to teach you her favorite thing in the world: Crafts! Each episode she teaches a different original idea like salt shakers for sugar, pom poms out of dad's favorite shirt, pants for plants, make your own scissors and a nose cozy! Oh, Kate by the way she doesn't has a severe need to please her mom!
imdb.title: Kate's Craft Corner
plot: Kate is here to teach you how to do crafts that she came up with.::Creator

Kate is here to teach you her favorite thing in the world: Crafts!
